Text: Thank You Very Much. Will have a go tomorrow. I just need a hair transplant...lol
thanks for finding such a nice ul. certainly I'll try it.
Clean, No virus found by FSecure.
plz HELP . IT says--The seleced file is not a valid ISO file.Please select avalid ISO file and try again---......Windows 7 Ultimate AIO Activated.

@balasa
You must have an ISO image file of W7 to create the DVD or USB. If you have it, it's possible that the file isn't good, maybe corrupted or else. I was using it with different ISO files with no problems, but bear in mind that it works with Windows 7 images only.
I create  same image file with poweriso on DVD and it work !!! But with this on USB ...not work for now ! And image file is Windows_7_Ultimate_AIO_Activated.   anyway thx

To anyone that is having "--The seleced file is not a valid ISO file.Please select avalid ISO file and try again" error see this website. The file you then download must be placed in the same folder as the ISO image. Run the application, a quick cmd prompt will flash. Try the windows usb drive maker again and it should work. Worked for me!
